mapper.select: SELECT seq, title, create_date as createDate, view_count FROM posts LIMIT #{page}, 10

SELECT p1.seq, p1.title, p1.contents, p1.create_date AS createDate, p1.view_count AS viewCount, (SELECT seq FROM posts WHERE p1.seq > seq ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1) AS prevSeq, (SELECT seq FROM posts WHERE seq > p1.seq ORDER BY seq ASC LIMIT 1) AS nextSeq FROM posts p1 WHERE p1.seq = #{seq}
